RJ, you act like a silly goose, take note, i didn't call you a silly goose,=
 
 i said, you are acting like one, everyone loves you here, even the spiri=
t  
world.  I feel bad for anyone that cannot hear the spirit talk, sometim=
es,  
they are so plain it's almost like they are in the same room with me.=
 sf
 
 
In a message dated 8/24/2010 10:42:46 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  =

rickwegrzyn@... writes:

 
 
 
 
Rj are you a Paronoid person,lol...=
There all out to get me..You dont  
answer my request to help you,why???


=
 
____________________________________
 From: Rj  <rasterer@...>
To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, August 24, 2010 8:27:33  AM
Subject: RE:=
 [EVP-ITC] A  suggestion for less hostility


BTW, if anyone is wondering w=
hat I am talking about, this  was a good 
example.
I offer a suggestion on =
getting things back on  track with less hostility, 
and I am immediately at=
tacked for making the  suggestion.


--- On Tue, 8/24/10, Fransen, Debbie  =
<debbie.fransen@...> wrote:


From:  Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@=
delta.com>
Subject: RE:  [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for less hostility
To:  "'E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com'" <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date:  Tuesday, August 2=
4, 2010, 7:16 AM


 
that would be fine, if you didn't piss Frank off......=
. But you  do.....
AND THAT IS NOT OKAY.....
The same thing will happen whe=
n you do it  again....
So what's the point in you being here.

 
__________=
__________________________
 From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com  [mailto:EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com] On Behalf 
Of  rasterer
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 2010 10:=
08  AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC]  A suggestion for les=
s hostility





I expect none of us like all the recent attacks, insults, =
 accusations, 
threats, hurting of feelings, and attempts to piss people  o=
ff. 

Can I suggest we stick to the purpose of the group: "the  discussion,=
 
promotion, and developemnt of Electronic Voice Phenomenon,  and Instrumen=
tal 
Transcommunication methods and technologies as used  in the communicat=
ion with 
spirit, and other entities."

And that  we go with Frank's philos=
ophy "just take the approach, try 
different  methods, see what works."

No=
 more threats. No name calling,  insults, or accusations. Just try to 
keep=
 a positive group attitude,  be open that not everyone believes what 
every=
one else does, and that's  ok?














--part1_aac9e.1bf0db7b.39a53b27_boundary
